summery: Results-driven Front End Developer with nearly 2+ years of experience in developing responsive and user-friendly web applications. Skilled in leveraging a diverse range of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular, ReactJS, to deliver innovative solutions. Proven track record of collaborating within cross-functional teams to drive project success. Eager to contribute technical proficiency, creativity, and a strong work ethic to a dynamic development team.

rolesAndResponsibilities: Led multiple brands, engaged with clients requirements to gather their feedback, and implemented their inputs in the most effective way.
Adapted to various team roles, seamlessly contributing to UI development when UI team members were unavailable.
Took ownership of bug fixes and quickly resolved live product issues.
Managed SEO by updating meta content and optimizing website performance.
Quickly adapted to new web technologies, seamlessly transitioning from Angular to React within a month, and actively contributing to projects in both technologies.
Implemented user-friendly web applications focusing on user interface design using HTML, CSS, TypeScript(a superset of JavaScript), with Angular and React.js libraries.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including backend developers and UX designers, to build successful products.
Interacting with clients, gathered their valuable business input, and converted their ideas into functional user interfaces.

projects.title: Super-app
projects.subTitle: Implementation of user friendly ,website Customizing Platform:
description: Implemented a user-friendly website customization platform for SaaS subscribers, incorporating standardized templates, themes, customizable Sections and much more.
Enhanced user-friendliness and customer orientation, resulting in improved platform adoption.
Personal Growth: Learned platform implementation from scratch, improved HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap skills with complex functionality

projects.title: Mymedic
description: Collaborated with prominent clients to customize our MyMedic application by tailoring based on their specific requirements. This involved close cooperation and communication to adopt the application to meet the unique needs and preferences of each client
Enhanced user-friendliness and customer orientation, resulting in improved platform adoption.

Integrated diverse third-party libraries including Firbase Cloud messaging, CDK DragDrops and Angular Editor seamlessly during the customization process. This strategic integration enhances the application's functionality by leveraging established tools, ensuring a robust and feature-rich user experience.
Optimized SEO by updating metadata and implementing schema markup.
Streamlined slot booking systems and order execution, enhancing order management across diagnostic, pharmacy, and doctor modules.
Developed user-friendly interfaces and responsive web applications using CSS, Bootstrap, AngularJS, and ReactJS, resulting in a 30% improvement in user satisfaction metrics.
Successfully fostered collaborative partnerships with industry leaders including VDC, Omega, Isha-clinic, Jeeone, GVK and more resulting in a significant increased revenue rate by 20%.
